name: outrun
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to move faster or further than someone or something: The men easily outran the police officer who was chasing them.
to develop faster or further than something: In the future, demand for tungsten will outrun supply.

to run faster than someone, or to increase faster or do better than something: Martha can outrun everyone on the team.
